sentences.en: An occasional polish will keep wall tiles looking good.
sentences.cn: 偶尔擦拭一下能使墙砖保持美观。

sentences.en: Aron couldn't speak Polish. I made myself understood with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 阿伦不会说波兰语，我为了让他明白我的话很是费了一番力气。

sentences.en: Five Polish banks are to be twinned with counterparts in Western Europe.
sentences.cn: 5家波兰银行将和5家西欧银行结为姐妹银行。

sentences.en: Germany, however, insists on restrictions on the import of Polish coal.
sentences.cn: 但是德国坚持对进口波兰煤炭加以限制.

sentences.en: He gave his counter a polish with a soft duster.
sentences.cn: 他用软抹布擦亮了自己的柜台。

sentences.en: He was a courier for the Polish underground and parachuted into Warsaw.
sentences.cn: 他是波兰地下组织的情报员，被空降到华沙。

sentences.en: I spent all afternoon polishing the silver.
sentences.cn: 我整个下午都在擦拭银器。

sentences.en: I spent all afternoon polishing the silver. ＃
sentences.cn: 我整个下午都在擦拭银器。

sentences.en: Polish industry generally is becalmed.
sentences.cn: 波兰工业普遍陷于停滞。

sentences.en: Polish up your writing skills on a one-week professional course.
sentences.cn: 上为期一周的专业课，提高你的写作技能。

sentences.en: Polish workers will now be making component parts for Boeing 757s.
sentences.cn: 现在波音757飞机的组成部件将由波兰工人制造。

sentences.en: She loved the scent in the house of wax polish.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢房子里打过蜡的味道。

sentences.en: The Catholic Church has played a prominent role throughout Polish history.
sentences.cn: 天主教会在整个波兰历史上曾发挥过举足轻重的作用。

sentences.en: The opera lacks the polish of his later work.
sentences.cn: 这部歌剧不及他晚期作品娴熟。

sentences.en: The Polish market in Berlin was considered unsightly and shut down.
sentences.cn: 柏林市内的波兰市场因为被认为有碍观瞻而关闭了。

sentences.en: The still air smelt faintly of furniture polish.
sentences.cn: 凝滞的空气中隐隐有股家具上光剂的味道。

sentences.en: They just need to polish their technique.
sentences.cn: 他们只需要改进一下自己的技艺。

sentences.en: they polished off most of the sausages.
sentences.cn: 他们很快吃掉了大部分香肠。

sentences.en: Those killed have been described as the flower of Polish manhood.
sentences.cn: 那些牺牲者被称为波兰男子中的精英。

sentences.en: Yesterday's resolution says the present Polish border is "inviolable".
sentences.cn: 昨天的决议称现在的波兰边界是“不可侵犯的”。

sentences.en: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.cn: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

words.tran_cn: 有礼貌的，客气的；文雅的；上流的；优雅的
磨光器；磨亮的人；[机] 磨光机
擦亮（polish的过去式和过去分词）
[机] 磨光；擦亮；修正（polish的ing形式）
[机]磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良

phrases.tran_cn: 迅速地完成：很快且轻易地做完或抛掉
n. （陆、海军等）过分注意整洁和闪亮的仪容；对服装过分的擦洗

trans.tran_cn: 擦亮剂，抛光，擦光的面，完美，文雅
trans.tran_en: a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny
to make something smooth, bright, and shiny by rubbing it
to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
